title: The Noise was deafening
creator_credit: Millbank Films, David Evans and Peter Rawson
brief_description: This film is a safety education film and is designed to make both management and employees aware of the irreversible effects of excessive noise, to show how noise surveys should be carried out, and to highlight some of the methods by which excessive noise can be reduced.
